description: Let AI-powered logo maker generate your new logo and create a brand identity design you love.
title: Design A New Logo & Brand Identity You Love! - LogoAI.com
keywords: new logo, brand identity design, brand logo design
introduction: LogoAI is an AI-powered logo maker that allows users to generate logos, create matching stationery, and design a brand they love. It offers a one-time payment pricing model where designing a logo is free, and users only pay to download the logo they want to use. New users can avail a special discount, while return customers can get at least a 40% discount using the code 'LOGOPRO'. LogoAI has helped over 3 million businesses create brand logos.
features: SMART AI engine for unique designs
PROFESSIONAL design sizes and formats available 24x7
AUTOMATED brand identity and social content creation
targetPeople: Businesses and individuals looking to create professional logos and brand identities.

faqs.question: Is designing a logo free?
faqs.answer: Yes, designing a logo is free on LogoAI. Users only pay to download the logo they want to use.

faqs.question: Are there any discounts available for return customers?
faqs.answer: Yes, return customers can get at least a 40% discount by using the code 'LOGOPRO'.
